title.title: Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour

image.title: Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: The sacred sanctuary of Monkey Forest is located on the southern border of Ubud town around 3 kms south of central town with a leading road also with the name of Monkey Forest. The presence of sacred forest is a demonstration of the harmonious coexistence of humans and nature. In Bali, sanctuaries such as the Ubud Monkey Forest sanctuary are usually in sacred village areas, often surrounded by temples. These cultural sanctuaries are not only an important part of Balinese heritage, but also an important part of everyday live.

title.title: Ubud Royal Palace | Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Rafting, ATV Ride and Horse Riding Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Royal Palace is a Ubud Kingdom Palace with excellent Balinese customary houses as a living arrangement of Ubud King. It is situated in the core of Ubud Bali with customary craftsmanship advertise just before it and it is found by Ida Tjokorda Putu Kandel who has instructed from year 1800 - 1823. Ubud has been an "imperial town" for over a hundred years. Its rulers, who bear the title "Tjokorda" or "Agung" still live in customary royal residences, called "Puris". Be mindful, on the other hand, that each spot called "puri" is not an imperial royal residence. The statement has been utilized generously recently

price.title: Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour Packages Price :
price.content:
Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour Packages Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,200,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 800,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 750,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 725,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour Packages Price Included :

  • Comfortable Private Car
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Mineral Water
  • Entrance Fee to all site
  • 2 Hours ATV Ride Adventure
  • ATV Bike (Single ATV Bike or Tandem ATV Bike)
  • Professional ATV Instructor
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour Packages Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy 2 Hours ATV Ride Adventure Tour Packages
ATV Ride Tour finish and enjoy lunch
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Visit Ubud Monkey Forest
Visit Ubud Royal Palace
Visit Ubud Art Market

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
